title: Eyeless in Gaza - 6 Albums [1981-1986]
description:
Eyeless in Gaza was Formed in 1980 in Nuneaton, Warwickshire, United Kingdom. 
Members were Martyn Bates (guitar, vocals), Peter Becker (bass, keyboards, vocals)
Related Artists: M.J. Harris & Martyn Bates, Martyn Bates & Troum, Anne Clark & Martyn Bates, Twelve Thousand Days, Hungry i  

Eyeless in Gaza's music is Emotional, sparse and atmospheric compositions that are a delight to hear. At times Eyeless in Gaza's music gets too cold and distant, gets lost in its own atmospheric reveries. However, for the most part this is rather charming in a minimalistic sort of way with plenty of moments of extreme, plaintive beauty to recommend it.


Photographs As Memories [1981]

Caught In Flux [1981]

Pale Hands I Loved So Well [1982]

Drumming The Beating Heart [1982]

Rust Red September [1983]

Back From The Rains [1986] + 12'' risen [1983]
